snippet.title: The Hundred Year Kingdom - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the trailer to meet the characters and more in this upcoming turn-based simulation game, The Hundred Year Kingdom, ahead of its release on PC and Nintendo Switch on February 3, 2022. 

In The Hundred Year Kingdom, you will build, cultivate, and guide a peaceful new civilization from the ground up with the help of a mythical goddess over the course of one hundred years.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #TheHundredYearKingdom
